meaningMnemonic: A <radical>teacher</radical> in <radical>winter</radical> is happiest because they get to <kanji>teach</kanji>! The kids can't go out and play because it's too cold. They all have to come in and stay warm as the teacher teaches!
readingMnemonic: Teachers can teach the most about Japan in winter by going to <reading>きょう</reading>と. きょうと is where all the old temples and history of Japan is centered. And it's really gorgeous when it snows.
